column1: Uchi////We started with the hama chili
column2: which I highly recommend.  It had all those things that I love about Thai food
column3: a little heat from the Thai chili and a little sweet and sour from the orange slices.  We also had the yokai berry and the machi cure
column4: all from the cool tastings.  The machi cure was as good as everyone said it was - bonus points for being encouraged to eat with your fingers in a nice restaurant!  The yokai berry was an antioxidant-inspired dish.  I didn't think I liked kale
column5: but this dish changed my mind.
